Comments_List: I liked the critical approach we followed in this class.
I learned how to read papers well and formulate written arguments about ideas in economics.
Reading and understanding papers, thinking critically about research and empirical strategies

Weakness: The material could be reduced a little bit. 

Strength: Very enjoyable class.
Tim's excellent lectures and guided discussions were the course's greatest strengths. The only weakness is that I had trouble reading some of the handwritten notes on my essays.

Manageable workload but still learned a large amount; great intro to many different fields; very useful advice about empirical strategies, what to avoid and how to do good research.  Class sometimes seemed a bit scattered but overall very useful, tons of great insights.
